creator: Creator
footerContactText: Do you have any questions? Contact Us.
sectionHeroTitle: Artificial intelligence tailored to your needs.
sectionHeroSub: Welcome to the world's first AI modeling agency. We are AVATAR VIDEO. Our task is to provide entrepreneurs with a solution that will change the face of creating advertising campaigns. Campaigns addressed to both the domestic customer and the foreign recipient.
sectionOrdersGeneralTitle: Order recordings like from a movie studio without limits
sectionOrders1Text: As a casting agency, we work with the best faces in the modelling industry
sectionOrders2Text: A modern solution to reduce costs related to video production.
sectionOrders3Text: Check in which languages our actors can advertise your brand.
sectionOrders4Text: You will receive your Basic order within 24 hours.
sectionOrders5Text: From business cards to full-size advertising productions, we provide the highest quality of AI marketing.
sectionOrders6Text: Become an avatar shareholder by investing in the actor's image rights.
sectionService1Title: Check offer and go to Creator
sectionService1Text: Familiarize yourself with the basic and extended possibilities of our service. Then select the "Creator" tab and start the order.
sectionService2Title: Face and voice are the basis of advertisement.
sectionService2Text: Select the actor and the language in which the recording is made. You can choose to work with a voiceover in the premium version or choose an artificial intelligence voice for the model. Check the recordings and decide which of the solutions will complement your project.
sectionService3Text: Enter the text you want to hear in your video. Create one recording in one language. If you exceed the limit of 1000 characters - the price will increase, keep this in mind. Take care of punctuation so that the project is well read.
sectionService4Title: Choose from a basic background or Custom offer
sectionService4Text: Customize the recording using ready-made solutions, or consult your idea with our team.
sectionService5Text: After making the payment, receive the finished recording within 24 hours.
sectionAboutText: We are the owners of Casting Studio - one of the largest casting portals in Europe. Thanks to many years of work in the modeling industry, we have perfectly learned the needs of our clients. It's time to show you the technology that will redefine the process of filmmaking with actors.
sectionPlansPremiumTool2: Full choice of actors and voices
sectionPlansCustomTool2: Full choice of actors and voices
sectionCreatorTitle: Create an Avatar in a few simple steps.
sectionModelSubTitle: Choose gender of your model, then choose preferred model
sectionTextSubTitle: Text entered will be spoken in full by the avatar.
sectionYorTextChart: * 1000 characters are assumed per minute of recording.
sectionBackgroundSubTitle: Choice of the background behind your avatar: green or white.
sectionPaymentSubTitle: Summary of your order and its detailed information.
